WESTERN ELECTRIC AM
...Specified in Original Building
250 W AM
CODE NUMBER-451 A-l Radio Transmit¬
ting Equipment.
FREQUENCY RANGE-540 to 2750 kilo¬
cycles. Any specified frequency in this
range.
POWER OUTPUT—250 watts.
PRIMARY POWER SUPPLY-200 to 240
volts, 60 cycles, single phase. (Can also
be furnished for 50 cycles.)
WEIGHT—Approximately 1000 pounds.
SEE PAGES 23-25 FOR ORIGINAL
PLANS OF BUILDING TO HOUSE THIS
TRANSMITTER.
